question: In 3-4 sentences, summarize the purpose of the 'Positional Encoding' section.
golden_answer: The positional encoding section introduces a method to inject sequence order information into the model, since self-attention itself has no inherent notion of position. The authors propose sinusoidal position encodings that vary smoothly with position. This allows the model to capture both absolute and relative positional relationships in sequences without recurrence or convolution. The encodings are added to the input embeddings.

question: In 2-3 sentences, summarize the role of feed-forward layers in the Transformer.
golden_answer: Each encoder and decoder layer contains a position-wise feed-forward network applied independently to each position. These layers consist of two linear transformations with a ReLU activation in between. Their role is to introduce non-linearity and increase representational capacity.
